name: INPriceRange
desc: Price information, as a range of possible values.

items.name: init(price: NSDecimalNumber, currencyCode: String)
items.desc: Initializes the object with the specified price information.

items.name: init(firstPrice: NSDecimalNumber, secondPrice: NSDecimalNumber, currencyCode: String)
items.desc: Initializes the object with the specified range of prices.

items.name: init(maximumPrice: NSDecimalNumber, currencyCode: String)
items.desc: Initializes the object with the specified maximum price information.

items.name: init(minimumPrice: NSDecimalNumber, currencyCode: String)
items.desc: Initializes the object with the specified minimum price information.

items.name: var currencyCode: String
items.desc: The ISO 4217 currency code that applies to the price information.
